text:
Occupational Safety and Health Administration  
Washington, D.C. 20210  
August 8, 2024 
M
EMORANDUM FOR:  The General Public  
FR
OM:  ANDREW LEVINSON 
Director  
Directorate of Standards and Guidance  
S
UBJECT:   Allow for OSHA’s supporting and related materials to be made publicly 
available in Docket OSHA -2021 -0009  prior to publication of the Heat Injury and Illness 
Prevention in Outdoor and Indoor Work Settings  Notice of Proposed Rulemaking 
(NPRM) 
Th
e purpose of this memorandum is to allow for OSHA’s supporting and related materials to be made 
publicly available in Docket OSHA -2021-0009 prior to publication of the Heat Injury and Illness 
Prevention in Outdoor and Indoor Work Settings NPRM . The comment period will be opened when the 
NPRM is published in the Federal Register .  
S
ome information (e.g., copyrighted material) is not publicly available to read or download through 
http://www.regulations.gov. All docket submissions, including copyrighted material, are available for 
inspection and, if permissible, copying at the OSHA docket office, U.S. Department of Labor, 200 
Constitution Ave, Room N3508, NW, Washington, DC 20210. Telephone number is 202-693-2350 (TTY 877 -889-5627). Should you have any questions regarding this memo, please contact Stephen 
Schayer  at schayer.stephen.r@d ol.gov .

The comment period will be opened when the NPRM is published in the Federal Register.
metadata.title: Memorandum Allowing OSHA’s Supporting and Related Materials to be Made Publicly Available in Docket OSHA-2021-0009 Prior to Publication of the Heat Injury and Illness Prevention in Outdoor and Indoor Work Settings Notice of Proposed Rulemaking (NPRM)
